text: Thanks serenity darts for delivering my darts. Through out the process the owner had been keeping me updated and constantly tracking my darts for me. If you are looking for services and not just the darts itself I will highly recommend serenity to you.

Had a really fruitful experience personalizing my first set of darts at Serenity Darts, Ruilin is really friendly and patiently went through the different components of it (the barrel, to the grip, and to the flight length). I was spoilt by choices when it comes to the aesthetics of the set as wellüòç

I greatly reccomend this place if you're considering to purchase your darts, I gained a new found appreciation to the differences of darts customization.

The staff and owner here are fantastic! They greeted us with such warmth and made sure to walk us through each barrel and flight option, helping us find the perfect match. Their patience and expertise made the experience so enjoyable, letting us explore different options until we found the ideal fit.

If you‚Äôre passionate about darts, I highly recommend this place‚ÄîI‚Äôll be telling all my friends!

One of the best experience I have on getting our darts accessories - Ruilin was extremely patient and knowledgeable to assist your needs. He has tons of samples & a board for you to try on. With his experience in the game, he‚Äôs able to cater for your needs. Truly a pleasant experience.

Ruilin was helpful in giving advices and recommendations for the barrels suitable for me. The range of products they carry and on display is extensive and you will definitely find something suitable. They are also very patient in letting me try whatever barrels and set up, as long as I wanted.

End up going with their Imagine brand barrel -PKS and is very happy about the experience.

Totally 10/10 in terms of products carried and customer service!
